title: Tadej Poga훾ar Stuns Strade Bianche with 80km Solo on Season Debut
content:
Poga훾ar makes audacious solo move on longest gravel sector of the race to set the tone on wildly ambitious 2024 season.

Read the full article at Tadej Poga훾ar Stuns Strade Bianche with 80km Solo on Season Debut on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
